about_the_game:
Prepare for a thrilling and distinctive battle tactics game that transcends the ordinary. Strategy in this game goes deeper, with the potential for losing battles to secure victory in the grander war.

Three radically different AI opponents challenge you with unique tactics in every battle. You'll engage in conflicts across diverse terrains, commanding a wide array of units and arranging your forces as you see fit. The flexibility to construct your base according to your vision is yours to exploit.

"Ever dreamed of becoming a general?" queried the recruitment center's poster.

Now, the opportunity is yours to grasp, as you ascend to the role of Battlefield General. Picture crafting your own unparalleled armies and orchestrating their every move.

Each battle promises excitement and complexity, thanks to the distinct AI adversaries. Leaderboards will display the Top General for all to see.

In this real-time strategy game with a hint of RISK, you'll command sizable armies. Erect a formidable base capable of withstanding enemy assaults. Will you build your army behind impenetrable defenses, primed for a massive assault? Or perhaps you favor small, swift strike teams. The choice is yours, for you are the General in this game.

Embark on a quest to locate the enemy's headquarters, drawing your armies within striking range to eradicate the malevolent infestation and unveil the hidden truth behind the enigmatic 3rd Invasion.

Introduction:

The tempest looms on the horizon.
The enemy is poised for action. Are you?

These are the units under your command.

The Story So Far


The tempest is on the brink of breaking.
However, we remain uncertain of its nature and origin...

The 1st Invasion brought the Zombie Plague. The Zombie Killing Cyborgs of the 1st Core made a valiant attempt to stem the tide. The 2nd Invasion saw the emergence of the Undead. The Wizards from the 2nd Circle engaged them in a relentless battle.

Yet, both invasions originated beyond Earth's realm...

Now, our armies have joined forces, resisting the First and Second Invasions, but we are aware that another menace looms.

Before each prior invasion, global radar systems experienced disturbances. Sometimes they went offline for an hour, while at other times, they burned out. Curiously, every Zombie plague outbreak or Undead awakening followed precisely ten days later.

This time, as the radar malfunctions once more, we've initiated an airlift operation into the affected zone...

Now, you must fight.
Fight to become Earth's savior.
